pages.text: Honey can be used for a wide range of beneficial elixirs through out the world.$(br2)Our master brewsmiths have been hard at work and have perfected the recipe for mead are are willing to share it with you.

To get started you will need to place four filled honey comb in the Fruit Press to produce one bucket of honey. The process doesn't take long to complete.$(br2)Next, take your bucket of honey and four bayanus yeast and place them into a ferment barrel. After the yeast has fermented the honey, use a glass bottle or a wine bottle to extract the fresh mead from the barrel.
